header_description: Unleash your potential and embark on a journey towards a stronger, fitter, and more confident you. Sign up for Make Your Body Shape now and witness the incredible transformation your body is capable of!

Eplore_programs.title: Strength
Eplore_programs.description: Embrace the essence of strength as we delve into its various dimensions: physical, mental, and emotional.

Eplore_programs.title: Physical Fitness
Eplore_programs.description: It encompasses a range of activities that improve health, strength, flexibility, and overall well-being.

Eplore_programs.title: Fat Loss
Eplore_programs.description: Through a combination of workout routines and expert guidance, we'll empower you to reach your goals.

Eplore_programs.title: Weight Gain
Eplore_programs.description: Designed for individuals, our program offers an effective approach to gaining weight in a sustainable manner.

class_section.title: THE CLASS YOU WILL GET HERE
class_section.description: Led by our team of expert and motivational instructors, 'The Class You Will Get Here' is a high-energy, results-driven session that combines a perfect blend of cardio, strength training, and functional exercises. Each class is carefully curated to keep you engaged and challenged, ensuring you never hit a plateau in your fitness endeavors.

why_join_us.title: WHY JOIN US ?
why_join_us.subtitle: Our diverse membership base creates a friendly and supportive atmosphere, where you can make friends and stay motivated

features.title: Good Management
features.description: Supportive management, for your fitness success

features.title: Practice Sessions
features.description: Elevate your fitness with practice sessions

features.title: Personal Trainer
features.description: Unlock your potential with our expert Personal Trainers

pricing.title: OUR PRICING PLAN
pricing.description: Our pricing plan comes with various membership tiers, each tailored to cater to different preferences and fitness aspirations

work.title: Before & After
work.hook: Every body tells a story — here are ours
work.description: Here’s a glimpse of the real impact — these are actual results from clients who committed to their fitness journey. With the right guidance, consistency, and personalized plans, achieving your dream physique isn't just possible — it's inevitable. See the difference for yourself.

reviews.name: Mohamed Elshahat
reviews.text: The trainer here is truly amazing. he push you to be your best!

reviews.name: Mark Thompson
reviews.text: Love the personalized plans they offer. I've seen real progress.

reviews.name: Lara Smith
reviews.text: Very clean gym with great equipment and even better staff!

reviews.name: Tom Hanks
reviews.text: Helpful and encouraging trainers. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Sara Parker
reviews.text: My favorite gym in the city. Amazing team and community.

reviews.name: Jake Lee
reviews.text: Trainers are knowledgeable and friendly, great experience!

reviews.name: Nina Patel
reviews.text: Equipment is modern and the atmosphere is motivating.

reviews.name: Chris Martin
reviews.text: Great results and fantastic support from the coaches!

reviews.name: Megan Davis
reviews.text: Flexible hours and welcoming environment. Love it!

reviews.name: Daniel King
reviews.text: The staff truly care about your goals. 10/10!

Calories.title: CALORIES CALCULATOR
Calories.subtitle: Discover Your Daily Caloric Needs
Calories.description: Calculate your personalized daily calorie requirements based on your gender, weight, height, and age. Get accurate results to help you maintain, lose, or gain weight according to your health goals.

brand.name: Leopard
brand.description: Take the first step towards a healthier, stronger you with our unbeatable pricing plans. Let's sweat, achieve, and conquer together!

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: I hope to write your opinion and get your feedback
